verses.text: O give thanks unto the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**; for he is* good: because his mercy endureth* for ever.
Let Israel now say, that his mercy endureth* for ever.
Let the house of Aaron now say, that his mercy endureth* for ever.
Let them now that fear the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** say, that his mercy endureth* for ever.
I called upon the \+w LORD strong="H3050"\+w** in distress: the \+w LORD strong="H3050"\+w** answered me, and set me* in a large place.+ 118.5 in distress: Heb. out of distress*
The \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** is* on my side; I will not fear: what can man do unto me?+ 118.6 on…: Heb. for me*
The \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** taketh my part with them that help me: therefore shall I see my desire* upon them that hate me.
It is* better to trust in the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** than to put confidence in man.
It is* better to trust in the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** than to put confidence in princes.
All nations compassed me about: but in the name of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** will I destroy them.+ 118.10 destroy…: Heb. cut them off*
They compassed me about; yea, they compassed me about: but in the name of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** I will destroy them.
They compassed me about like bees; they are quenched as the fire of thorns: for in the name of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** I will destroy them.+ 118.12 destroy: Heb. cut down*
Thou hast thrust sore at me that I might fall: but the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** helped me.
The \+w LORD strong="H3050"\+w** is* my strength and song, and is become my salvation.
The voice of rejoicing and salvation is* in the tabernacles of the righteous: the right hand of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** doeth valiantly.
The right hand of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** is exalted: the right hand of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** doeth valiantly.
I shall not die, but live, and declare the works of the \+w LORD strong="H3050"\+w**.
The \+w LORD strong="H3050"\+w** hath chastened me sore: but he hath not given me over unto death.
Open to me the gates of righteousness: I will go into them, and* I will praise the \+w LORD strong="H3050"\+w**:
This gate of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, into which the righteous shall enter.
I will praise thee: for thou hast heard me, and art become my salvation.
The stone which* the builders refused is become the head stone* of the corner.
This is the \+w LORD’s strong="H3068"\+w** doing; it is* marvellous in our eyes.+ 118.23 the \+nd LORD’s\+nd*…: Heb. from the \+nd LORD\+nd**
This is* the day which* the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w** hath made; we will rejoice and be glad in it.
Save now, I beseech thee, O \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**: O \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, I beseech thee, send now prosperity.
Blessed be* he that cometh in the name of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**: we have blessed you out of the house of the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**.
God is* the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**, which hath shewed us light: bind the sacrifice with cords, even* unto the horns of the altar.
Thou art* my God, and I will praise thee: thou art* my God, I will exalt thee.
O give thanks unto the \+w LORD strong="H3068"\+w**; for he is* good: for his mercy endureth* for ever.
